name: cat notebook (itch)
description:
cat notebook

this is a WALKING SIMULATOR for a VIRTUAL MUSEUM that plays at the pace of DESERT BUS. You're going to go fucking insane playing this shit. It is sprawling and gigantic and has a shit ton of amazing art and original music to experience. there are next to no gameplay elements. this game is FUCKING HARD, i made it and i still haven't beat it. I'm scared to even fucking try
